name: Nuts and Volts
description:
Nuts and Volts follows the adventure of a little robot named Dos-Bot trying to deliver a battery.

 He faces foes and challenges along the way and  must keep the battery charged at all costs. 

When Dos-Bot runs out of his health he starts draining from the battery he carries. Dos-Bot can recharge his main health but not the secondary battery. The Special EMP attack uses a charge of the second battery to wipe out most enemies around you.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Left-Click - Fire Laser

Right-Click - Special EMP Attack

Shift/Ctrl - Dodge

R - Reset to Hub (just in case of a bug)

OUR WONDERFUL CAST

G.E.O.R.G.

Giant Electronic Obliteration Robot Golem
Simple worker bot corrupted by a virus turned into vicious  killer.
Unleashes a smashing attack in an area.

O.D.O.M.

Optical Destructive Orbital Mine
Defensive units that have been corrupted by a virus.
Fires lasers at any it perceives as intruders.

SLUDGE

Well uhhh sludge. 'Nuff said.
